tool_description: This API shows latest climate data around the world
name: Climate Data
title: Climate Data

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source news
api_list.description: Gets climate news from a specific news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-data1.p.rapidapi.com/news/nationafrica"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-data1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all climate news from all over the world
